Field.Name: GTIMER_CYCLE
Field.Description: Global timer period.

Field.Name: GTIMER_RESET_ON_TRIGGER
Field.Description: All related counters are cleared when GTIMER_TRIGGER is set

Field.Name: GTIMER_ENABLE
Field.Description: Set all counters to work in global timer mode

Field.Name: GTIMER_TRIGGER
Field.Description: Global counter trigger. When set, global counter start counting. Trigger is cleared when counter expires.
